column1: }}'''Nessanië''' was the daughter of [[Hallatan]] of [[Hyarastorni]], a descendant of [[Elros]] in the sixth generation. Her younger brother was [[Hallacar]], spouse of [[Tar-Ancalimë]], Queen of [[Númenor]].<ref>{{UT
The meaning of Nessanië's name is not entirely clear, but appears to be derived from the [[Quenya]] name of the [[Valier
